item.title: Configure Your BadgeR+
item.description:
This guide is intended for system administrators at organizations implementing and distributing the BadgeR+ Wearable Duress Button. If you are looking for instructions for everyday use of your BadgeR+, view the BadgeR+ User Guide.

System administrators should be familiar with the content in both this BadgeR+ Admin & Configuration Guide and also the BadgeR+ User Guide.

The BadgeR+ Device

Letâ€™s first get familiar with the BadgeR+ Wearable Duress Button and its components. Here is an overview snapshot of the device:
